title: A2141 - 820-01700-A rebooting
message:
Hi,

I have an A2141 - 820-01700-A rebooting.

Client was covering the web cam with a sticker, but presured to much the sticker, that broke the display (and probably damaged the cam).

Now the mac is rebooting, even with just the board on the bench, and client needs to recover his data. He doesn't need the repair. Just power on the mac, so he can retrive is data by external display.

I can hear the chime, and se a black screen on external monitor, before it reboots.

I don't see anything damaged on board, and don't know where to start.

Can you help?

title: A2141 - 820-01700-A rebooting
message:
Did you try safe mode?
Still reboots in target disk mode?

title: A2141 - 820-01700-A rebooting
message:
I've tried safe mode and it still reboots.
Target disk mode I haven't tried. Shal I mount it again and try?

title: A2141 - 820-01700-A rebooting
message: Compare diode mode readings and voltage on data lines and power rail of ALS/camera with good board.
